tripleplay.ui
Class Root

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.ui.Element<T>
      tripleplay.ui.Elements<Root>
          tripleplay.ui.Root
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Element<?>>
public class Root
extends Elements<Root>

The root of a display hierarchy. An application can have one or more roots, but they should not overlap and will behave as if oblivious to one another's existence.
